name: Blob Omelette
description:
Playing the desktop version is recommended for a better experience!

Keyboard controls

  • X/C to stretch and move
  • Z/R/Shift to retry if you get stuck (it happens)
  • WASD/Arrow keys to navigate menus

Gamepad controls

  • LB/RB to stretch and move
  • B to retry if you get stuck (it happens)
  • Left stick/D-Pad to navigate menus

Credits

Made in 2 weeks for the LOWREZJAM 2022.

  • Font: C&C Red Alert by N3tRunn3r
  • Game engine: https://heaps.io/
  • Graphics: Aseprite, Pixel Fx Designer
  • Music/SFX: Bitwig, ktso, psykic, Synplant, Microtonic, Synth1
